thread.title: Sotheby's exhibits huge Taubman collection prior to sales
thread.title_full: Sotheby's exhibits huge Taubman collection prior to sales

title: Sotheby's exhibits huge Taubman collection prior to sales
text: > Entertainment Sotheby's exhibits huge Taubman collection prior to sales Picasso’s “Woman Seated on a Chair,” a portrait of his lover and muse Dora Maar painted in 1938, is among A. Alfred Taubman's 500-piece collection being exhibited before auction at Sotheby's, Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in New York. The collection will be auctioned over four dedicated sales, three in November and one in January, and estimated to bring more than $500 million. (AP Photo/Bebeto Matthews)
